means: 毒死( poison的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Employees were taken to hospital yesterday after being poisoned by fumes.
sentence.Network_cn: 因吸入有害气体而中毒的员工昨天被送进了医院。

sentence.Network_en: He was terrified to eat, suspecting that the food was poisoned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不敢吃东西，怀疑食物被人投了毒。

sentence.Network_en: He was barely able to drag his poisoned leg behind him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他极费力地拖着那条中毒的腿走路。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Animal toxin is poisoned for humans and animals , but it has also some medicinal value ., 动物毒素对人与动物有毒害作用 , 但也有一定药用价值.
the Wagner clan , he inherited " a glorious but poisoned legacy " .他形容瓦格纳家族“一部充满辉煌和毒药的遗产”。
The dragon is dead , poisoned , and the hero Siegfried is unemployed., 恶龙死了 , 被毒死了 ; 而屠龙英雄 Siegfried 也失业了.

Japanese police have said it is unlikely the dumplings were poisoned in Japan as the pesticide is banned in the country and traces of it have been found in some intact packages .日方警方已表示，饺子在日本被投毒的可能性很低，因为上述杀虫剂在日本已属禁用，而且一些未开封的包装内部也发现了杀虫剂的残余。

list.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... spider n 蜘蛛 poisonous adj 有毒的；有害的；恶毒的 cellphone n 手机.
常见疾病英文单词_百度文库 ... asthenia 虚弱 poisoning 中毒 fatigue 疲劳.
英语合成词_百度文库 ... data processing 数据处理 food poisoning 食物中毒 weightlifting 举重.
毒药（poison）（Poison）香水是法国Christian Dior公司出品的女用香水，属东方香型。瓶身造型典雅，有红绿白紫蓝五种不同香氛的水晶包装。

entry.def: Poison is a substance that harms or kills people or animals if they swallow it or absorb it.

example.ex: Poison from the weaver fish causes paralysis, swelling, and nausea...
example.tran: 龙的毒素会引起瘫痪、肿胀和恶心。
水银是一种已知的有毒物质。

entry.def: If someone poisons another person, they kill the person or make them ill by giving them poison.

example.ex: The rumours that she had poisoned him could never be proved.
example.tran: 她曾下毒害他的谣言永远都无法得到证实。

entry.def: If you are poisoned by a substance, it makes you very ill and sometimes kills you.

example.ex: Employees were taken to hospital yesterday after being poisoned by fumes...
example.tran: 因吸入有害气体而中毒的员工昨天被送进了医院。

example.ex: Toxic waste could endanger lives and poison fish.
example.tran: 有毒废物可能危及生命，毒死鱼类。

entry.def: If someone poisons a food, drink, or weapon, they add poison to it so that it can be used to kill someone.

example.ex: If I was your wife I would poison your coffee.
example.tran: 如果我是你老婆，我会在你的咖啡里下毒。

entry.tran: 破坏，污染（水、空气或土地）
entry.def: To poison water, air, or land means to damage it with harmful substances such as chemicals.

example.ex: ...the textile and fibre industries that taint the air, poison the water and use vast amounts of natural resources...
example.tran: 污染空气、破坏水源并消耗大量自然资源的纺织纤维工业

example.ex: The land has been completely poisoned by chemicals.
example.tran: 土地已被化学品彻底污染。

entry.def: Something that poisons a good situation or relationship spoils it or destroys it.

example.ex: The whole atmosphere has really been poisoned.
example.tran: 整个气氛已全然遭到破坏。

example.ex: ...ill-feeling that will poison further talk of a common foreign policy.
example.tran: 将会危害有关共同外交政策的进一步商讨的敌意

entry.tran: （通常指以谎言）使（对…）产生恶感，使（对…）心怀仇视
entry.def: If someone poisons your mind against another person, they make you dislike that person, usually by telling you things that are not true.

auth_sentence.content: Some say he was poisoned by Pinochet's agents.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some say he was poisoned by Pinochet's agents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some say he was poisoned by Pinochet's agents.

auth_sentence.content: There were also four incidents involving illegal poisoned baits.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were also four incidents involving illegal poisoned baits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were also four incidents involving illegal poisoned baits.

auth_sentence.content: The drone is a high-tech version of poisoned toothpaste.
auth_sentence.res_content: The drone is a high-tech version of poisoned toothpaste.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The drone is a high-tech version of poisoned toothpaste.

means.word_mean: 有毒的；中过毒的；发炎的

sentences.en: They fired poisoned arrows at us.
The poisoned food has been removed from the shops and there is no threat to public health.
sentences.cn: 有毒食品已从商店取走，不会对公众健康造成威胁。

means.word_mean: 金杯毒酒；看似诱人实则令人讨厌的事物

sentences.en: He inherited a poisoned chalice when he took over the job as union leader.
sentences.cn: 他接手工会领道职务，看似风光，实则会给他带来很多麻烦。
